attributes.action: Raise the limit of savings from £16,000 to a much high figure
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A lot of pensioners have savings of more than £16,000 especially joint savers and we feel it is not fair that we have to keep digging into our savings to pay for council tax and other payments.  We have worked hard all out adult lives and saved hard, and been taxed on our bit of interest, and then when it is time to enjoy it we see it dwindle away on bills that we should get some help with.  The threshold should be at least £40,000 for a couple.
